entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
